question: According to her letter, her business is ____ in Australia.
She ____ some fresh beans to make coffee.
Any cellphone found on the school premises was automatically ____.
Many English words are _____ from latin.
Even though he _____ broccoli his wife often served it.
The comedian made his name by ____ politicians and other powerful figures.
The students were bored but some tried to ____ interest.
They tried to ___ an answer from the little boy, but he refused to speak.
The spy was _____ as he tried to leave the country.
